xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 04:24 <16WAALOBK> has joined #phenotips 04:25 <sdumitriu> is now known as <Guest9004> 08:41 <Guest9004> has quit 08:46 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 10:18 <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:29 <sdumitriu> Hey akats 10:29 <sdumitriu> We'll be there shortly 10:38 <akats> has quit 10:38 <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:40 <akats> Morning! I'll see you in a bit then. 10:57 <16WAALOBK> has quit 10:57 <sdumitriu> has quit 10:57 <akats> has quit 11:08 <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:08 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 11:33 <akats> has quit 11:58 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 11:58 <23LAA3EZR> has joined #phenotips 11:58 <23LAA3EZR> has quit 11:58 <marta__> has quit 11:58 <23LAA3PTC> has joined #phenotips 11:58 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 12:02 <23LAA3PTC> has quit 12:02 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 12:11 <akats> has joined #phenotips 12:36 <akats> How do I get an xwiki document from reference. This doesnt seem to work XWikiDocument(documentReference) 12:40 <sdumitriu1> Two ways 12:40 <sdumitriu1> 1. Using components: @Inject a DocumentAccessBridge and use getDocument(reference) from it, cast the result to XWikiDocument 12:41 <sdumitriu1> 2. The old way, get hold of an XWikiContext and an XWiki object and use xwiki.getDocument(reference, context) 12:42 <akats> AccessBridge it is. 12:43 <akats> Thank you 14:37 <akats> has quit 15:26 <akats> has joined #phenotips 15:28 <akats> I pushed a rough draft of what patient-data looks like now. The basic structure is in place though. 15:28 <akats> https://github.com/soLEED/phenotips-1/compare/issue-JSON?expand=1 16:16 <sdumitriu1> akats: Looking 16:31 <akats> Also me and Andrey think that we should talk to you about how we should continue 16:32 <sdumitriu1> OK 16:56 <sdumitriu1> akats: Done with the review for now 16:58 <akats> Already looking at it. Thank you. 17:04 <sdumitriu> has quit 17:06 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 18:08 <akats> has quit
